title: OT93: Giant Threadwood
summary:
Key ideas
- The post is an open forum for readers to discuss a variety of topics.
- The author mentions the SSC podcast and changes to the Patreon donations.
- The author highlights a comment of the week discussing the Paul Marik sepsis study.
- David Friedman is holding an upcoming South Bay SSC meetup.

Key learnings
- The Patreon donations have shifted from per-post to per-month.
- The author has more flexibility to choose how many hours he works due to Patreon support.
- One reader is seeking help to run a cheaper and faster version of a Paul Marik sepsis study in South Africa.
- There is a South Bay SSC meetup on January 27th.

Key questions
- None mentioned in this portion of the post.
